1056.issue: [W1056] js-controller 5.0.19 listed as dependency but 6.0.11 is recommended. Please consider updating dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/pixelit-project/ioBroker.pixelit/blob/master/io-package.json).

4038.issue: [S4038] .vscode/settings.json file missing "json.schemas" property. Add schema definitions for better IntelliSense support.
